title: Question 16
prompt: Some laundry detergents can be irritating to the skin.
description: Choose the answer that best develops the following topic sentence:
feedback: The correct answer develops the topic sentence by giving supporting details.  A topic sentence states the main idea of a paragraph.  You can think of it as being the most general sentence of the paragraph.  The other sentences in the paragraph describe and support the topic sentence.  In this case, the topic sentence states that some ingredients can be irritating to the skin. The correct answer supports this idea by giving a specific example of how the detergent can be irritating.
